Name: Mummy on the run
About the game: Mummy on the Run is a puzzle game in a beautiful 3D landscape. As a mummy your task is to escape from your pyramid. Other mummies want to escape, too. Save them all! Activate teleport gates or springboards to prevent all mummies from falling into the quicksand or walking into the brutal traps. Solve the puzzle in each room and fight for the liberty of the mummies! puzzle game with 40 levels enjoy approximately 10 hours of solving the puzzles increasing difficulty relaxing oriental background music 1 to 6 mummies in each level
